email_content:
Hi VerifyCorp Team,

As requested, I’m providing the background-check documentation for TechGenius’s newest hire:

• Employee name: Emily Thompson
• Documents available: signed Background-Check Authorization form, completed I-9, completed W-4, resume, and onboarding checklist.

For security reasons, I have these files stored in our secure HR drive. Please provide the preferred secure link or upload portal details, and I’ll transfer the files immediately.

Let me know if you need any additional information.

Best regards,
John
Human Resources Manager | TechGenius
